tool_description: StockTwits provides a social communications platform and social graph for anyone interested in the markets and investing.
name: StockTwits
title: StockTwits

api_list.name: messages/like
api_list.description: Like a message on StockTwits as the authenticating user.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the message you want to like for the authenticating user

api_list.name: account/verify
api_list.description: This verifies the credentials of a user. Useful for checking if authentication method is correct.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name, add this parameter as the value.

api_list.name: messages/show
api_list.description: This shows the specified message details. This is used in a stand alone display. View the display guidelines

optional_parameters.name: conversation
optional_parameters.description: Set to true to retrieve all meesages of the associated conversation.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name, add this parameter as the value.

api_list.name: streams/mentions
api_list.description: Returns the most recent 30 messages containing mentions of the authenticating user's handle. These are considered public replies

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (more recent than) the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: max
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (older than) or equal to the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Default and max limit is 30. This limit must be a number under 30.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name, add this parameter as the value.

api_list.name: messages/unlike
api_list.description: Unlike a message on StockTwits as the authenticating user.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the message you want to unlike for the authenticating user

api_list.name: streams/user
api_list.description: Returns the most recent 30 messages for the specified user. Includes user object in response.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: User ID or Username of the stream's user you want to show

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (more recent than) the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: max
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (older than) or equal to the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Default and max limit is 30. This limit must be a number under 30.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name, add this parameter as the value.

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Filter messages by links, charts, or videos.

api_list.name: watchlists/index
api_list.description: Returns a list of private watch lists for the authenticating user.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name, add this parameter as the value.

api_list.name: account/update
api_list.description: This updates the properties of the authenticating user's account.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The full name of the account holder

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: The email address for the account holder

optional_parameters.name: username
optional_parameters.description: The username for the account holder

api_list.name: streams/direct
api_list.description: Returns the most recent 30 direct messages sent to the authenticating user. These area all private messages sent and recieved.

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (more recent than) the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: max
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (older than) or equal to the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Default and max limit is 30. This limit must be a number under 30.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name, add this parameter as the value.

api_list.name: streams/home
api_list.description: Returns the most recent 30 messages posted to the authenticating user's home stream, which is made up of the users and stocks they follow.

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (more recent than) the specified ID

optional_parameters.name: max
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (older than) or equal to the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Default and max limit is 30. This limit must be a number under 30.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name, add this parameter as the value.

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Filter messages by links, charts, videos, or top.

api_list.name: streams/symbol
api_list.description: Returns the most recent 30 messages for the specified symbol.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Ticker symbol, Stock ID, or RIC code of the symbol

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (more recent than) the specified ID

optional_parameters.name: max
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (older than) or equal to the specified ID

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Default and max limit is 30. This limit must be a number under 30

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name, add this parameter as the value.

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Filter messages by links, charts, videos, or top.

api_list.name: streams/investor_relations
api_list.description: Returns the most recent 30 messages posted by verified Investor Relations customers.

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (more recent than) the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: max
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (older than) or equal to the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Default and max limit is 30. This limit must be a number under 30.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name, add this parameter as the value.

api_list.name: streams/friends
api_list.description: Returns the most recent 30 messages posted to the authenticating user's people stream of the users they follow.

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (more recent than) the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: max
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (older than) or equal to the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Default and max limit is 30. This limit must be a number under 30.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name, add this parameter as the value.

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Filter messages by links, charts, videos, or top.

api_list.name: streams/watchlist
api_list.description: Returns the most recent 30 messages for the specified watch list for the authenticating user. The watch list is a private list of all the symbols a user is watching.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the watch list you want to show from the authenticating user

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (more recent than) the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: max
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (older than) or equal to the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Default and max limit is 30. This limit must be a number under 30.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name, add this parameter as the value.

api_list.name: watchlists/show
api_list.description: Returns the the list of ticker symbols in a specified watch list for the authenticating user. Required parameter is the ID of the watch list, not the name of the watch list.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the watch list to be shown

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name, add this parameter as the value.
